Texts.Chs: 带^orange;100份基因^reset;给这个位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;的黄色的阿威坎人。
Texts.Eng: Bring ^orange;100 Genes^reset; to the yellow Avian at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我的^orange;基因提取器^reset;出故障了，我需要100份^orange;基因^reset;以完成我的工作以及以防万一！你能帮我解决这个麻烦吗？
Texts.Eng: My ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset; is on the fritz and I need 100 ^orange;Genes^reset; gene to complete my work and get it ready for an event! Can you help me out?

Texts.Chs: 非常感谢你，有了你的帮助研讨会一定会大获成功！作为感谢，请拿着这个^green;凶残谋杀指南^reset;！嗯，一份食谱而已。
Texts.Eng: Thanks to you, the symposium will be a success! As gratitude, have this ^green;instrument of brutal and calculated murder^reset;! Well, the recipe anyways.
